basics.name: David A. Gifford Jr.
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software engineer with a passion for leaning new ways to make products better.

work.summary: Design, develop, and maintain a full range of software applications from ASP.NET and PHP web apps to legacy Windows applications
highlights: Work with development team to update developer process to streamline the department's project flow

work.summary: Design, develop, and maintain a full range of software applications from ASP.NET and PHP web apps to legacy Windows applications
highlights: Work as a team to build and design new functionality of the OneFlow product
Bring new development technologies to the OneFlow product (e.g. MVC design pattern and WebAPI as a business layer to better structure code base)
Lead team in .NET technologies and mentor junior developers

work.summary: Design, develop, and maintain a full range of software applications from ASP.NET and PHP web apps to legacy Windows applications
highlights: Work within a team to design cost effective solutions to problems
Act as point of contact for systems and technologies of familiarity to peers
Designed and developed multiple applications to meet the changing needs of the company using C#, jQuery and ASP.NET

work.summary: Design, develop, and maintain a full range of software applications from ASP.NET and PHP web apps to legacy Windows applications
highlights: Acted as primary support of Verifications/QA department as well as several mission critical operations applications
Worked in a team to develop new system for Quality Assurance department using Silverlight, C# and Entity Framework
Developed enhancements to the Audio Recording Archiving system
Worked with Senior level developers to support operations systems in VB.NET, ASP.NET and SQL
Helped design new applications and revisions to existing ones
Worked with a team to support the Verifications/QA departmentâ€™s software applications
